pageProduct.name: Panadol Extra with Optizorb Paracetamol Pain Relief Caplets 20
pageProduct.description:
Information

Benefits of Panadol Extra

• It offers fast, effective and temporary relief of pain and discomfort

• Each caplet contains paracetamol and caffeine, plus advanced Optizorb technology, designed to fight five types of tough pain

• The addition of caffeine enhances the analgesic effect of paracetamol

When to Use Panadol Extra?

Panadol Extra with Optizorb acts fast to provide pain relief of the following types of tough pain:

• Headache/Tension headache

• Migraine headache

• Period pain

• Muscular aches and pains

• Toothache/Dental pain

Contains paracetamol.

Why Choose Panadol Extra?

Panadol Extra with Optizorb Formulation contains a clinically proven combination of ingredients for fighting tough pain.

Caplets are oval-shaped, as well as film-coated, making them easier to swallow and leaving no bitter aftertaste.

When you want a powerful pain reliever, choose Panadol Extra.

Explore our Range

Panadol Extra

• The ingredients in Panadol Extra are a clinically proven combination of ingredients to fight tough pain

• Each caplet contains paracetamol and caffeine, plus advanced Optizorb technology, designed to fight five types of tough pain

Panadol Rapid

• Panadol Rapid Is absorbed twice as fast as regular Panadol tablets

Panadol Optizorb

• The Optizorb Formulation contains a patented delivery system which allows it to deliver paracetamol more efficiently by breaking down faster than regular Panadol tablets

Panadol Mini Caps

• A physically smaller capsule-shaped tablet with a smooth gelatin coating for easy swallowing

• No gluten, lactose or sugar

Panadol Osteo

• The paracetamol in Panadol Osteo Is released In 2 stages, with the first stage being released quickly, for rapid onset of action, and the second stage being released slowly over the day or night, to provide prolonged pain relief

• Panadol Osteo tablets are gentle on the stomach*

*When used as directed

This medicine may not be right for you. Read the warnings before purchase. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional. Incorrect use could be harmful.

General Information

Panadol Extra with Optizorb Formulation contains a clinically proven combination of ingredients for fighting tough pain.

When you want tough pain relief, choose Panadol Extra with Optizorb, from Australia's Most Trusted Pain Relief Brand.*

Panadol Extra with Optizorb contains a clinically proven combination of medicinal ingredients. Each caplet contains paracetamol and caffeine, with advanced Optizorb technology. Panadol Extra with Optizorb is designed to fight five types of tough pain: migraine headache, period pain, tension headache, muscle aches and pains, and dental pain/toothache.

Get tough on tough pain. Choose Panadol Extra with Optizorb Caplets for relief of tough pain.

Panadol Extra with Optizorb (pain relief caplets) doesn't contain ibuprofen, gluten, lactose or sugar.

 

Panadol Extra with Optizorb (pain relief caplets) contains a clinically proven combination of medicinal ingredients for fighting five types of tough pain.

Panadol Extra with Optizorb acts fast to provide pain relief of the following types of tough pain:

  • Headache/Tension headache
  • Migraine headache
  • Period pain
  • Muscular aches and pains
  • Toothache/Dental pain

Panadol Extra provides tough pain relief. When you want a tough pain reliever, choose Panadol Extra with Optizorb.

*Reader's Digest Trusted Brands Survey Australia, 2018

Boxed Contents: 20 caplets, capsule shaped tablets

Size: 20 Pack

Warnings

"Do not use Panadol Extra with Optizorb:
- If you are allergic to paracetamol, caffeine or hydroxybenzoates
- If using other medicines containing paracetamol or caffeine
- For children below age 12
- For more than 48 hours for children aged 12-17 except on medical advice
- For more than a few days at a time in adults except on medical advice
- If pregnant, except on medical advice
- If any of the seals on this packaging are broken
- If the package use-by date has expired
- Until you read the enclosed leaflet carefully

Ask a doctor before use
- If you have liver or kidney problems
- If you are taking warfarin (a medicine used to thin the blood)
- If you are breastfeeding

Stop use and see your doctor immediately if
You have an allergic skin reaction, shortness of breath or wheezing after taking Panadol. These reactions are very rare."

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

While using Panadol Extra with Optizorb (pain relief caplets):
If an overdose is taken or suspected, ring the Poisons Information Centre (AUST: 13 11 26; NZ: 0800 764 766) or go to the hospital immediately, even if you feel well because of the risk of delayed, serious liver damage if left untreated.

ESSENTIAL SAFETY INFORMATION

Limit the use of caffeine-containing products (including tea and coffee) when taking these caplets. One dose of Panadol Extra contains 130mg of caffeine - this is about 2 cups of instant coffee. Caffeine may cause sleeplessness if it is taken within several hours before going to bed.
Pharmacy Medicine.
Keep out of reach of children.
Does not contain gluten, lactose or sugar.

Ingredients

Each caplet contains Paracetamol 500mg & Caffeine 65mg.

Active Ingredients: Each caplet contains Paracetamol 500mg & Caffeine 65mg.

Contains: Hydroxybenzoates as preservatives.

Directions

12 years - Adult: Take 2 caplets every 4-6 hours with water as required (Maximum 8 caplets in 24 hours).

USAGE ADVICE

HOW TO USE PANADOL EXTRA WITH OPTIZORB FORMULATION (PAIN RELIEF CAPLETS):
Age: 12 - Adult
Caplets: 2
How often: every 4-6 hours with water as required (maximum 8 caplets in 24 hours)

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
